title: Acupuncture works naturally!
description: Providing herbal medicine, acupuncture and acupressure service
cleaned_text: Acupuncture works naturally! Dunamis Acupuncture and Herb Clinic is dedicated to providing Acupuncture, Herbal Medicine & Acupressure to our community. [Acupuncture](services/acupuncture.html) is a six-thousand year-old Chinese therapy that works by stimulating the body to naturally correct the imbalances of Qi. This is done by inserting ultra-fine, disposable needles underneath the skin at specific points in the body. [Read more...](services/acupuncture.html) [Herbal Medicine](services/herbal-medicine.html) Traditional Chinese Herbal Medicine consists of 5,767 substances derived from plant, animal, and mineral sources. The use of these substances can be traced back to 1,000 BC. [Read more...](services/herbal-medicine.html) [Acupressure](services/acupressure.html) Acupressure is a form of touch therapy that utilizes the principles of acupuncture and Chinese
